caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. A man who appeared to be a king was conversing with some children, and then he exchanged warm greetings with another man. Afterwards, the two of them entered an underground passage and continued talking as they walked. It seemed like they were reminiscing about the past. Meanwhile, in another room, a man and a woman were engaged in an intimate encounter. At that moment, another man walked in. He had a conversation with the shorter man on the bed, then left the scene and returned to the underground passage, where he was caressing a stone statue.Simultaneously, in a different location, a woman was preparing to take a bath. A man entered, gently undressed her, and began to caress her.
